title: Log in and file your Self Assessment tax return

details.description: Log in and send your Self Assessment tax return online or get help with lost user IDs, password or account activation codes
details.more_information:
You can't use this service: 

+ if you haven't got an [HMRC online account](/how-to-send-self-assessment-online/sign-up-for-an-online-account "Get an HMRC online account")
+ to send certain tax returns - eg [partnership returns](/how-to-send-self-assessment-online/software-you-can-buy "When you need extra software to send your tax return") (because you need extra software to send this to HMRC) 

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
details.introduction: Log in to your HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) online account and send (file) your tax return or get help with lost user IDs, passwords, activation codes and technical support.

details.description: Includes filing, deadlines, pay and tax records
Includes VAT, debt and inheritance tax
